BitampText.Text: Dive into gameplay with the most common settings (2P Duplicated Input)
BitampText.GainFocusCommand: %function(self) self:y(20); self:hidden(0); self:finishtweening(); gnChoice = 2; MESSAGEMAN:Broadcast('gnChoiceChanged'); self:diffusealpha(0); self:linear(0.5); self:diffusealpha(1); end
BitampText.OffCommand: %function(self) if gnChoice == 2 then self:linear(0.3); self:diffusealpha(0) end end
